import React, { useState } from 'react' import TreePot from '../../assets/tree-pot.png' const TreeCard = ({info}) => { const {available, setTotalPrice, totalPrice, price} = info const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(0) const handleIncreasingQuantity = () => { if (available){ setQuantity( prev => prev + 1) setTotalPrice(totalPrice + price) } } const handleDecreasingQuantity = () => { if (quantity > 0){ setQuantity( prev => prev - 1 ) setTotalPrice(totalPrice - price) } } const color = available ? "green" : "red" const loadTailwind = <>
const decreasingStyle = quantity === 0 ? 'text-gray-400 cursor-not-allowed' : 'hover: scale-110 cursor-pointer' const increasingStyle = available ? 'hover: scale-110 cursor-pointer' : 'text-gray-400 cursor-not-allowed' return (
{false && loadTailwind}
